colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG RGYAL PO SDE LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'PHRIN LAS CHAR RGYUN BSKUL BA'I 'BRUG SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DOS KYIS GSAR DU BZUNG BA'I CHOS SDE DGE TSOGS GLING DU RGYAL RGYAL PO SKU LNGA SRUNG MAR MNGA' GSOL TE, PHO BRANG GSAR BZHENGS DANG RTEN 'DZUGS RGYUN GTOR SOGS TSAD LDAN SKABS ZLA RE BZHIN GSOL MCHOD BYED PA LA CHO GA RGYAS PA ZHIG BYUNG NA LEGS PAR BSAM NA 'BRI 'DUN YOD THOG MTSAN LTAS BZANG POR RLOM CHOG PA DGA' ZHIG KYANG BYUNG BAS RKYEN BYAS TE, KU SA LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS 'BRAL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO GROS DANG LDAN PA AOR DU SU HANG GIN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAR MAS BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
